whatAre.title: 1. What are cookies?
whatAre.content: Cookies are small text files that websites install on the user's device to store and retrieve information. Their main purpose is to improve the user experience and collect statistical usage data.

usedCookies.title: 2. Cookies used on this site
usedCookies.intro: This site uses Google Analytics cookies to collect anonymous information about site usage, such as visited pages, visit duration, and the type of device used.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal basis
legalBasis.content: The legal basis for the use of non-essential cookies is the user's consent, requested before installing any cookie that is not strictly necessary for the functioning of the site.

manageCookies.title: 4. How to manage cookies
manageCookies.intro: You can configure your browser to block or delete cookies at any time:

banner.content: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze the use of the site.
